body_html:
@KaiyuYue How many data loader workers are you using, I assume you are using infiniband right? If you are using more than 1 data loader worker, this is notoriously causing the Gloo hang at the DistributedDataParallel constructor while it's trying to broadcast a series of tensors, which I had a workaround fix in master but not in 0.3 yet.

So if so, please use spawn or fork-server init method for multiprocessing instead of fork. This will prevent this kind of hang from happening, please let me know if it works for you
